com.simas.vc.editor.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • com.android.layoutlib.bridge.MockView
          • android.view.SurfaceView
            • android.widget.VideoView
              • com.simas.vc.editor.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, android.media.SubtitleController.Anchor, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, android.widget.MediaController.MediaPlayerControl

    public final class Player
extends android.widget.VideoView
implements android.media.MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener
    Wrapper class for VideoView. Allows the use of multiple OnPreparedListeners. Also limits the use of video setting to local strings. Allows checking if it's prepared.

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent ev)
        Description copied from class: android.view.View
        Implement this method to handle touch screen motion events.

        If this method is used to detect click actions, it is recommended that the actions be performed by implementing and calling View.performClick(). This will ensure consistent system behavior, including:

        • obeying click sound preferences
        • dispatching OnClickListener calls
        • handling ACTION_CLICK when accessibility features are enabled
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class android.widget.VideoView
        Parameters:
        ev - The motion event.
        Returns:
        True if the event was handled, false otherwise.
